plot.title: Disk IOPS
plot.tsquery: select  read_ios_rate,write_ios_rate where category = disk and logicalPartition = false AND clusterDisplayName RLIKE "..*" and hostname RLIKE "[^m].*"

plot.title: Disk Bytes
plot.tsquery: select  read_bytes_rate,write_bytes_rate where category = disk and logicalPartition = false AND clusterDisplayName RLIKE "..*" and hostname RLIKE "[^m].*"

plot.title: Disk Queue
plot.tsquery: select average_queue_length where category = disk and logicalPartition = false AND clusterDisplayName RLIKE "..*" and hostname RLIKE "[^m].*"

plot.title: Disk Service Time
plot.tsquery: select service_time where category = disk and logicalPartition = false AND clusterDisplayName RLIKE "..*" and hostname RLIKE "[^m].*"
